## minimaIndex variable

Returns index of the first local &amp; internal minima found in given `values` array, or -1 if no such minima exists. The search range can be optionally defined via semi-open \[from, to) index interval.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
minimaIndex: (values: number[], from?: number, to?: number) => number
```
